values.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

  <!-- Define complex type for bookingdates -->
  <xs:complexType name="BookingDatesType">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element name="checkin" type="xs:date"/>
      <xs:element name="checkout" type="xs:date"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <!-- Define complex type for booking -->
  <xs:complexType name="BookingType">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element name="firstname" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="lastname" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="totalprice" type="xs:decimal"/>
      <xs:element name="depositpaid" type="xs:boolean"/>
      <xs:element name="bookingdates" type="BookingDatesType"/>
      <xs:element name="additionalneeds" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <!-- Define complex type for created-booking -->
  <xs:complexType name="CreatedBookingType">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element name="bookingid" type="xs:integer"/>
      <xs:element name="booking" type="BookingType"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <!-- Define root element -->
  <xs:element name="created-booking" type="CreatedBookingType"/>

</xs:schema>
